thread.title: Compagnie Plastic Omnium Signs Agreement With German Group Mahle To Acquire Its 33.33% Shareholding In The HBPO Joint Venture

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Compagnie Plastic Omnium Signs Agreement With German Group Mahle To Acquire Its 33.33% Shareholding In The HBPO Joint Venture
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - COMPAGNIE PLASTIC OMNIUM SA:
* SIGNED AN AGREEMENT WITH THE GERMAN GROUP MAHLE TO ACQUIRE ITS 33.33% SHAREHOLDING IN THE HBPO JOINT VENTURE
* TRANSACTION SHOULD BE FINALIZED DURING 2018‍​ * ACQUISITION WAS MADE AT AN ENTERPRISE VALUE OF EUR 350 MILLION‍​
* ACQUISITION TO BE FINANCED BY THE GROUP’S OWN RESOURCES
* TO RETAIN 66.66 PERCENT FOR HBPO, HELLA 33.33 PCT‍​ Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
